about.title: About Sentinela
about.intro: Sentinela is a crowdsourced emergency reporting platform that empowers communities to report disasters, fires, floods, and other emergencies in real-time.
about.emergencyContactsDescription: If you are facing a storm or flood-related emergency, contact emergency services immediately.
about.howItWorks1: Citizens report incidents by pinning locations on the map
about.howItWorks2: The community validates reports through upvotes and comments
about.howItWorks3: Escalated reports can be sent directly to local government
about.howItWorks4: Everyone stays informed with real-time updates
about.freeParagraph1: Sentinela is provided completely free to communities in Portugal and across Europe. We believe emergency reporting infrastructure should be accessible to everyone, everywhere - no subscriptions, no hidden fees, no barriers.
about.freeParagraph2: Whether you're in Lisbon, Porto, or anywhere else in the world, Sentinela is here to help your community stay safe and informed.
about.openSourceParagraph1: Sentinela is fully open source under the MIT license. You can inspect the code, suggest improvements, report bugs, or adapt it for your own community.
about.openSourceParagraph2: Contributions are welcome — whether it's code, translations, or ideas.
about.builtByParagraph1: Sentinela is developed and maintained by Darkmatter AI Labs, a team focused on building AI-powered tools that make a real difference in people's lives.
about.builtByParagraph2: We're committed to keeping Sentinela open, reliable, and always improving. If you have feedback or want to get in touch, visit us at darkmatter.is.
about.dataSourcesDescription: Sentinela integrates real-time data from multiple open sources to give you the most complete picture of what's happening in your area.
about.communityProjectsDescription: Sentinela is part of a growing ecosystem of civic tech projects in Portugal. Here are some other initiatives doing important work in emergency response and community safety.

fogos.name: Fogos.pt

aprsfi.name: APRS.fi

noaaSwpc.name: NOAA SWPC

gdacs.name: GDACS

overlays.weatherDescription: Real-time weather tiles from OpenWeatherMap (precipitation, clouds, temperature, wind & pressure).
overlays.earthquakesDescription: Seismic events from the last 24h via USGS Earthquake Hazards Program.
overlays.procivDescription: Active civil protection incidents in Portugal via Fogos.pt (fires, accidents, weather events).
overlays.rainfallDescription: Accumulated rainfall from IPMA weather stations across Portugal. Updated every 10 min.
overlays.warningsDescription: Official weather warnings from IPMA (wind, rain, snow, heat, cold, fog, thunderstorms). Updated every 30 min.
overlays.temperatureDescription: 2m temperature forecast from NOAA GFS model. Updated every 6 hours.
overlays.humidityDescription: 2m relative humidity forecast from NOAA GFS model. Updated every 6 hours.
overlays.precipitationDescription: Accumulated precipitation forecast from NOAA GFS model. Updated every 6 hours.
overlays.cloudCoverDescription: Total cloud cover forecast from NOAA GFS model. Updated every 6 hours.
overlays.stormPotentialDescription: CAPE (Convective Available Potential Energy) from NOAA GFS. Higher values indicate greater storm/thunderstorm potential.
overlays.fireWeatherDescription: Fire Weather Index calculated from NOAA GFS temperature and humidity data. Shows wildfire risk levels.
overlays.activeFiresDescription: Satellite-detected fire hotspots from NASA FIRMS (VIIRS/MODIS). Updated every ~3 hours.
overlays.airQualityDescription: PM2.5 air quality data from Open-Meteo (CAMS/ECMWF). Shows pollution levels across Europe. Updated every 30 min.
overlays.oceanWavesDescription: Significant wave height from PacIOOS WAVEWATCH III model. Global coverage at 0.5 degree resolution. Updated hourly.
overlays.aircraftDescription: Real-time aircraft positions from the OpenSky Network. Includes flight info, altitude, and speed.
overlays.lightningDescription: Real-time lightning strikes from the Blitzortung network. Shows strikes from the last 30 minutes.
overlays.kiwisdrDescription: KiwiSDR software-defined radio receivers. Click to listen to radio frequencies 0-30 MHz.
overlays.aprsDescription: Amateur radio APRS network positions. Shows HAM operators, weather stations, and digipeaters.
overlays.spaceWeatherDescription: Current space weather conditions from NOAA SWPC. Shows Kp index and HF radio propagation.
overlays.tecDescription: Total Electron Content showing ionospheric conditions. Affects GPS accuracy and radio propagation.
overlays.gdacsDescription: GDACS global disaster alerts: earthquakes, floods, cyclones, volcanoes, wildfires, droughts. Updates every 10 minutes.
